title: Remote Telemedicine-Based Trauma Resuscitation Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and foundational understanding of human anatomy
context.additional_context: Learners participate in real-time video lectures and simulation modules using personal devices, with formative assessments conducted weekly to measure learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Perform initial assessment steps for trauma patients (ABCDE approach) with 80% accuracy
Complete VR-based resuscitation simulations in telemedicine environments with over 90% proficiency
Score 75+ points in three or more formative assessments of team-based emergency response protocols
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
